pages.title: Requirements
pages.text: To reforge your armor $(l)you will need$():$(br)$(li)Some rarity materials.$(li)An armor piece.$(li)A bunch of                    $(3)$(l)Sigils of Rebirth$().$(li)$(4)$(l)A Reforging table$().$(br2)Once you have all these items it gets $(o)intuitive$().

pages.title: Reforge your armor
pages.text: Now that you have all the ingredients place them inside accordingly inside the reforging table and $(br)$(l)$(o)roll the dice$() on your armor piece.$(br2)You can $(l)re-roll$() as much as you have materials and xp for.
